cluster_relations.rel_desc: Urban legends are disseminated across different regions.
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Geographic Scales of Urban Legend Spread

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Stories function to warn the listeners who hear them.
cluster_relations.object_class_group: Folklore & Urban Legends â€“ Narrative Social Roles

cluster_relations.rel_desc: In the motif, candy is used as bait to lure children.
cluster_relations.subject_entity_name: strangers luring children with candy (urban legend)

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an informational or cultural phenomenon becomes present in or extends across multiple geographic regions.
args.justification: The relation links urban legends to regions with qualifiers about being disseminated across areas as societies interconnected, which is best modeled as a spatial spread of a cultural item.
This captures the spread of a cultural narrative (urban legends) across geographic regions, which is a form of cultural transmission.
The core semantics emphasize movement/spread of legends across regions (spatial distribution), supported by the rel_hint_type 'spatial-spread' and spatial qualifier.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a communicative act or narrative serves to warn or caution a target audience.
args.justification: The description states that stories function to warn the listeners; this is a direct communicative warning effect from stories to listeners.
The relation describes the functional role or effect of a story on its audience (warning/cautionary function), which fits a narrative-function class.
The story acts as an agent performing a communicative act (warning) on listeners; this is best grouped under agent-to-recipient communicative action.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an entity is used instrumentally as bait or enticement to achieve a goal.
args.justification: The motif explicitly describes candy being used as bait to lure children; this is an instrumental use of candy as an enticement.
The candy functions as an instrument or tool in the luring scenario, corresponding to an instrumental-use relation class.
The semantics center on how candy is used (its functional role as bait), so this belongs in a broad usage/functional group.
